# This file is managed by Puppet. DO NOT EDIT.

# sssd::config
[sssd]
domains = LOCAL, test.case
services = nss, pam
config_file_version = 2
reconnection_retries = 3
debug_timestamps = true
debug_microseconds = false

# sssd::service::autofs
[autofs]
debug_timestamps = true
debug_microseconds = false

# sssd::service::nss
[nss]
debug_timestamps = true
debug_microseconds = false
reconnection_retries = 3
enum_cache_timeout = 120
entry_cache_nowait_percentage = 0
entry_negative_timeout = 15
filter_users = root
filter_groups = root
filter_users_in_groups = true

# sssd::service::pam
[pam]
debug_timestamps = true
debug_microseconds = false
reconnection_retries = 3
offline_credentials_expiration = 0
offline_failed_login_attempts = 3
offline_failed_login_delay = 5
pam_verbosity = 1
pam_id_timeout = 5
pam_pwd_expiration_warning = 7

# sssd::service::ssh
[ssh]
debug_timestamps = true
debug_microseconds = false
ssh_hash_known_hosts = true

# sssd::service::sudo
[sudo]
debug_timestamps = true
debug_microseconds = false
sudo_timed = false

# sssd::domain LDAP
[domain/LDAP]
debug_timestamps = true
debug_microseconds = false
description = LDAP Users Domain
min_id = 1000
max_id = 60000
enumerate = false
cache_credentials = true
account_cache_expiration = 0
use_fully_qualified_names = false
ignore_group_members = true
id_provider = ldap
auth_provider = ldap
access_provider = ldap
chpass_provider = ldap
sudo_provider = ldap
autofs_provider = ldap
dns_resolver_timeout = 5
case_sensitive = true
proxy_fast_alias = false

# sssd::provider::ldap
debug_microseconds = false
krb5_canonicalize = false
krb5_use_kdcinfo = true
ldap_access_order = expire,lockout
ldap_account_expire_policy = shadow
ldap_chpass_update_last_change = true
ldap_default_authtok = <PASSWORD>
ldap_default_authtok_type = password
ldap_default_bind_dn = cn=Administrator,cn=Users,dc=test,dc=case
ldap_disable_paging = false
ldap_disable_range_retrieval = false
ldap_force_upper_case_realm = false
ldap_groups_use_matching_rule_in_chain = false
ldap_id_mapping = false
ldap_id_use_start_tls = true
ldap_idmap_autorid_compat = false
ldap_initgroups_use_matching_rule_in_chain = false
ldap_krb5_init_creds = true
ldap_pwd_policy = shadow
ldap_referrals = true
ldap_sasl_canonicalize = false
ldap_schema = rfc2307
ldap_search_base = dc=test,dc=case
ldap_sudo_include_netgroups  = true
ldap_sudo_include_regexp = true
ldap_sudo_use_host_filter = true
ldap_tls_cacertdir = /etc/pki/simp_apps/sssd/x509/cacerts
ldap_tls_cert = /etc/pki/simp_apps/sssd/x509/public/host.test.case.pub
ldap_tls_cipher_suite = HIGH:-SSLv2
ldap_tls_key = /etc/pki/simp_apps/sssd/x509/private/host.test.case.pem
ldap_tls_reqcert = demand
ldap_uri = ldap://FIXME
ldap_use_tokengroups = false
ldap_user_gecos = dn

# sssd::domain LOCAL
[domain/LOCAL]
debug_timestamps = true
debug_microseconds = false
description = LOCAL Users Domain
min_id = 1000
max_id = 60000
enumerate = false
cache_credentials = false
account_cache_expiration = 0
use_fully_qualified_names = false
ignore_group_members = true
id_provider = local
auth_provider = local
access_provider = permit
dns_resolver_timeout = 5
case_sensitive = true
proxy_fast_alias = false

# sssd::provider::local
debug_timestamps = true
debug_microseconds = false
create_homedir = true
remove_homedir = true

# sssd::domain test.case
[domain/test.case]
debug_timestamps = true
debug_microseconds = false
min_id = 1000
max_id = 60000
enumerate = false
cache_credentials = true
account_cache_expiration = 0
use_fully_qualified_names = true
ignore_group_members = true
id_provider = ad
access_provider = ad
dns_resolver_timeout = 5
case_sensitive = true
proxy_fast_alias = false
realmd_tags = manages-system joined-with-adcli

# sssd::provider::ad
ad_domain = test.case
ad_server = ad.test.case
default_shell = /bin/bash
dyndns_update = true
fallback_homedir = /home/%u@%d
krb5_realm = TEST.CASE
krb5_store_password_if_offline = true
ldap_id_mapping = false
ldap_use_tokengroups = true
